snippet.title: Ruin of the Reckless: Release Announcement Trailer (Updated)
snippet.description:
-YES! Screenshake can be turned off and is FULLY adjustable! :) -

We're working on a new trailer with the screenshake turned down!

Note: this is a RE-UPLOAD. The original trailer and comments can be found here - https://youtu.be/LaHr-nB7lfI

On Steam: http://store.steampowered.com/app/516430
On GOG.com (URL pending)
On Itch.io: https://fauxoperativegames.itch.io/ruin-of-the-reckless
On the Humble Store: https://www.humblebundle.com/store/ruin-of-the-reckless

Since the beginning of time, or maybe longer, this place has been here. It is a beacon of sorts, attracting the souls of those who both lived and died with recklessness in their hearts.

Bound by some unknown force, these wayward spirits cannot leave.

And so they remain… With time their souls will rot. They will fade away and they will be forgotten.

But even here there is hope… a legend whispered among the ghosts and specters. That any spirit to reach the tower’s peak will be granted one wish…
